content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that as we discussed earlier only the rental price negotiations are allowed in this conversation scenario. Kindly focus on proposing and discussing the rental price for clarity in our dialogue. If we agree on a price, I'll respond with 'TERMINATE' to conclude this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
